title: Best Pre-Built Gaming PC In 2024
text: Gear up for some serious computing with 2024’s finest pre-built PCs. Last year's top-tier gaming PCs pushed the boundaries of performance to new heights. We witnessed the emergence of 40-series Nvidia builds, increased adoption of 13th Gen Intel CPUs, and the gradual transition to DDR5 memory becoming mainstream. Fast-forward to 2024, and it seems like all the next-gen parts are finally in harmony. With a comprehensive range of offerings from AMD, both processors and GPUs, coupled with the availability of more DDR5 systems, this year promises to be just as exciting, especially if you’re looking to invest in a gaming PC. In essence, 2024 is poised to deliver an exceptional experience for prospective PC enthusiasts, regardless of whether you want a one to game your butt off, or get work done! And, no! You don’t NEED to build your own PC every time. A pre-built PC is just as good. And, as long as you follow this guide, you’ll have all the information you need to choose a build that is perfect for you. So, buckle up, and let’s start your journey through the world of “you won’t have to worry about where the RAM fits” pre-built PCs. Intel Core i9-12900K, 32GB DDR5. NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090, 1TB SSD, 2TB HDD The Acer Predator Orion 7000 is a powerful, high-end desktop PC built for gaming at the best possible speed and quality. It features an Intel Core i9 processor and a mighty 32GB RAM, alongside a GeForce RTX 3090 GPU and plenty of storage. Behold! The Acer Predator Orion 7000 - a behemoth powered by the latest Intel Core i9 12900K. This gaming powerhouse ensures that every aspect of your gaming experience, from graphics to AI, is nothing short of exceptional. Paired with a cutting-edge graphics card, the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3090, the Orion 7000 redefines visual fidelity, offering immersive gameplay that pushes the boundaries of reality. With ample RAM and lightning-fast SSD storage, this PC sets a new standard for 13th-gen excellence. Prepare to be transported to a gaming universe where every frame is as smooth as butter, and victory is the ultimate destination. AMD Ryzen 5 5600G, AMD RX6400, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD The HP Victus 15L is a gaming desktop designed to get you playing great games at a low cost, sporting an AMD CPU and GPU combo, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD for storage. Meet the HP Victus 15L - the knight in shining armor for budget-conscious warriors. Don't be deceived by its modest price tag; this budget-friendly champion is powered by a potent combination of performance and affordability, offering excellent value. Beneath its sleek exterior lies a capable AMD Ryzen 5 5600G processor and AMD RX6400 graphics card, that refuse to compromise on performance. Whether you're diving into the latest titles or tackling intense multiplayer battles, the HP Victus 15L is a hidden treasure chest in the realm of affordable gaming, where winning doesn't cost an arm and a leg. 13th Gen Intel Core i9, 32GB RAM, and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080, 1TB SSD Alienware's Aurora R15 Gaming Desktop redefines performance with its 13th Gen Intel Core i9, 32GB RAM, and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080 (with the option to upgrade). Boasting a 1TB SSD and liquid cooling, it delivers exceptional speed, stability, and extreme future proofing. Cue the grand entrance for the Alienware Aurora R15 – the crown jewel in the high-end gaming monarchy. This gaming royalty is not just a PC; it's a symphony of cutting-edge tech, jaw-dropping visuals, and unparalleled performance. Do you wanna play Cyperpunk 2077 on ultra settings? You got it! Do you want more than 1000 frames per second on Valorant? You betcha! There’s no game this PC can’t crush. With the option of upgrading to the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090, an envy-inducing 128GB of RAM, the latest i9 processor, and a storage solution that matches its regal stature, the Alienware Aurora R15 propels you into a gaming dimension where only the elite dares to tread. Say farewell to reality; you have officially ascended. AMD Ryzen 5 5600G, 16GB HyperX Memory, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti, 1TB SSD HP Omen 40L has everything you need to experience the latest games in 1080p and 1440P without breaking a sweat. This pre-build is decked out with a GeForce RTX 3060 Ti graphics card, AMD Ryzen 5 processor, and 16GB RAM. For those who seek the gaming sweet spot, enter the HP Omen 40L - the best mid-range pre-built PC you can ask for. Pretty sure Thanos was referring to this PC right here when he said, “perfectly balanced, as all things should be.” With the kind of power this PC embodies, you will find it at amazing mid-range prices, striking the perfect balance between performance and affordability. Fueled by a robust AMD Ryzen 5 5600G processor and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti graphics card that knows how to handle the heavy lifting, the Omen 40L invites you to experience gaming bliss without the financial stress. With ample RAM and storage, this PC is your golden ticket to mid-range gaming that doesn't come with an astronomical price tag. Game Anywhere, Anytime For gaming-on-the-go, the ASUS ROG Ally is a surprisingly powerful handheld gaming PC with a wide gaming library that will have you gaming for hours on end. Meet the Asus ROG Ally – not just a gaming PC, but a portable powerhouse designed for on-the-go chicken dinners. With specs that defy its compact design, this handheld marvel allows you to take your gaming adventures wherever life takes you. Armed with two surprisingly powerful allies – the AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme processor and AMD RDNA 3 graphics card – and storage that is my no-measures puny, the ROG Ally is like having a gaming genie in your pocket. It grants wishes for reliable performance, compact design, and the ability to explore the picturesque worlds of your favorite games anytime, anywhere. Intel Core i5-13400F, 16GB RAM, GeForce RTX 4060 8GB, 1TB SSD The Gamer Xtreme is a desktop PC that delivers great gaming performance for a great price. With a GeForce RTX 4060 GPU and Intel Core i5 processor, it has plenty of room for RAM and storage upgrades. For those who don’t want to be caged by the parts they have currently. For those who are always looking towards the next best, upgrading and customization are your best friends, and that’s where CyberPower Gamer Xtreme comes in. Started by two friends in 1998, for people who wanted truly customizable PCs, the CyberPower Gamer Xtreme will help you unleash your inner tech wizard as you tinker, upgrade, and evolve your gaming rig. With customizable specs and room for expansion, this build is ideal for your “never settle” attitude. For those who aren't familiar with computer parts, buying a gaming PC can be a lot easier than picking and assembling them yourself. It reduces the chances of things going wrong and saves time, especially for busy folks. When choosing a gaming PC case, make sure it fits your setup and looks good to you. Focus on picking the right CPU and GPU, especially if you want to play games in high definition. Adding an SSD can also make your games load faster. If you haven't upgraded any parts of your gaming PC, it should work well for about two to four years. After that, it might start slowing down, mainly because new games need more power to run smoothly, and older hardware can't keep up. We hope you like the items we recommend and discuss!
